plot: Three friends decide to marry. Each of them go through a journey of self realisation as they choose their partners. A witty and funny story with real life experiences that could or do happen to all of us.
title: French Fries and Curry
plot_es: Three friends decide to marry. Each of them go through a journey of self realisation as they choose their partners. A witty and funny story with real life experiences that could or do happen to all of us.
